ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a from-scratch implementation of Minecraft using Go and OpenGL. It features procedurally generated terrain, a physics engine, dynamic lighting, and block manipulation. The project demonstrates how to build a 3D voxel game engine from the ground up, focusing on performance and custom implementations.
